name: Stock Portfolio Tracker
description: App that tracks your daily stock profit / loss with interactive ui

scripts.build-assets: npm run copy-css && npm run copy-js
scripts.copy-css: mkdir -p assets/css && cp node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css assets/css/ && cp node_modules/bootstrap-icons/font/bootstrap-icons.css assets/css/ && cp -r node_modules/bootstrap-icons/font/fonts assets/css/
scripts.start: npm run build-assets && cross-env NODE_ENV=development electron-forge start
scripts.start:prod: npm run build-assets && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-forge start
scripts.make: npm run build-assets && cross-env NODE_ENV=production electron-forge make

author: Gaurav Solanki
